overview:
A 20-year veteran of deal-making in the software, finance, and telecom industries, Ms. Nasch was most recently the Vice President of Market Management at Fair Isaac, Inc. (NYSE: FIC), a provider of decision management solutions driven by advanced business intelligence and predictive modeling.

Prior to Fair Isaac, Nasch held leadership positions in the incubation phase of numerous startups, and lead development of products, sales strategies, business models and corporate vision at the Brightspark Group, a leading early-stage software venture capital fund.

She was a founding member of BackWeb Technologies (NASD: BWEB), and managed European business development projects at AT&T Business Network, Europe Online, and Reuters. Nasch began her career as a Network Engineer for the US and European governments.

Nasch holds a degree in Computer Science from DMS, South Africa.
